mapper.insert: insert into lab_user(totalAddMoney, username, totalUseMoney, remainMoney, score, createTime, updateTime, password, age, remark) values(${totalAddMoney}, #{username}, ${totalUseMoney}, ${remainMoney}, ${score}, now(), now(), #{password}, #{age}, #{remark})
insert into lab_buy_good(userId, goodName, useMoney, createTime) values(${userId}, #{goodName}, ${useMoney}, now())
insert into lab_add_money(userId, addMoney, createTime) values(${userId}, ${addMoney}, now())
